Key Arguments: The legislation will harm Australians by silencing them.
The government's role is to protect individual rights, not suppress them.
The government should not have the authority to determine what constitutes misinformation and disinformation.
The bill is seen as an attack on freedom and democracy.
Notable Quotes: The government will cause harm by silencing Australians!
This is government over each on a grand scale.
What makes the government think it has the right to be the arbiter of what is 'misinformation and disinformation'. What arrogance!!
This bill is an attack on freedom and democracy.
